summary:
Add new female follower to the game base of cross races between
argonian and nord. Level Up with player from Lv 20
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][b]JUVIA THE ARGONIAN NORD FOLLOWER[/b] HDT

Add new "Stand Alone Retexture" female follower to the game base of cross races between
argonian and nord.

Name: Juvia

Level: 20

Class: Thief

Body Type: CBBE

Weight: 100

[b]Location :[/b]
Riften Bee and Barb Inn

[b]Required :[/b]
Skyrim.esm

[size=3][b][u]> > Required for HDT< <[/u][/b]

Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)
http://skse.silverlock.org/

XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by [b]xp32[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800

HDT Physics Extensions by [b]HydrogensaysHDT[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996

Installation :

simply use NMM or Copy to data folder

Uninstall :

Remove from NMM or Data folder[/size]

[b]Recommended :[/b]
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul by [b]Original - fLokii -- Recent updates - Vamyan[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037

Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO by [b]terzaerian[/b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019
